Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to activate the wear command of an object as soon as the player takes it?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to activate the wear command of an object as soon as the player takes it?

Posts.EditableText:
I'd probably give it a `changedparent` script:
```
if (this.parent = game.pov) {
  WearGarment (this)
}
```
(maybe also printing a message, if you want to make it clear to the player that they're wearing the object)
